title: Taboomenu插件的占位符(PlaceholdersAPI)不再工作
author: 城雨
txt_content: 这不应该啊。[PlaceholderAPI] TabooMenu is currently using a deprecated method to hook into PlaceholderAPI. Placeholders for that plugin no longer work. Please consult [[filoghost, 坏黑]] and urge them to update it ASAP.

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
降级 papi 至 2.7 

或者让作者去更新
